plugin.name: claude-sdd
plugin.description: Spec-Driven Development lifecycle with Claude Code Agent Teams. Manages the full development lifecycle from requirements gathering through implementation, quality verification, and integration.
plugin.short_description: SDD lifecycle management with Agent Teams

skills.name: sdd-intake
skills.description: Requirements gathering (Confluence, Jira, Figma, file, interview)

skills.name: sdd-assign
skills.description: Team member assignment to work packages with member CLAUDE.md generation

skills.name: sdd-build
skills.description: Implementation with Agent Teams quality loop (TDD mode supported)

skills.name: sdd-review
skills.description: Quality gate verification against spec checklist

skills.name: sdd-change
skills.description: Change management: impact analysis, partial checklist update, TDD delta build

skills.name: sdd-publish
skills.description: Publish SDD artifacts to Confluence with diagram PNG attachments

skills.name: sdd-lint
skills.description: Code analysis: diagnostics, structural search, symbols, formatting

agents.name: sdd-requirements-analyst
agents.description: Extracts and structures requirements from Confluence/Jira/Figma

agents.name: sdd-spec-writer
agents.description: Generates technical specifications and compliance checklists

agents.name: sdd-implementer
agents.description: Implements work packages as Agent Teams member (TDD mode supported)

agents.name: sdd-reviewer
agents.description: Verifies implementation against spec checklist (TDD compliance check)

agents.name: sdd-code-analyzer
agents.description: Automated code analysis with native tools and ast-grep

agents.name: sdd-test-writer
agents.description: TDD test writer: generates failing tests from specs (no implementation code)

agents.name: sdd-change-analyst
agents.description: Change impact analysis: code analysis, spec delta generation, minimal impact principle

hooks.description: Detects SDD project, shows phase and checklist progress
Auto-patches gopls/kotlin-lsp .lsp.json with full paths and prewarms kotlin-lsp JVM

confluence_mcp.note: User must configure in their environment

jira_mcp.note: User must configure in their environment

ast_grep.purpose: Structural code search and symbol extraction in /claude-sdd:sdd-lint
